NeuralNetwork.Components

Class Layer

  • java.lang.Object
    • NeuralNetwork.Components.Layer

  • public class Layer
extends java.lang.Object
    Layer represents a layer at the neural network. Each layer owns n neurons.

      Layer instantiater (for JSON)
